text: <FI> in<Fi> journeyings often, <FI>in<Fi> perils of rivers, <FI>in<Fi> perils of robbers, <FI>in<Fi> perils from <FI>my<Fi>  countrymen, <FI>in<Fi> perils from the Gentiles, <FI>in<Fi> perils in the city, <FI>in<Fi> perils in the wilderness, <FI>in<Fi> perils in the sea, <FI>in<Fi> perils among false brethren;
name: II Corinthians 11:26
